verbs.description: Most of the talk on the tubes [V: has] centered around Thomas McInerney ’s outrageous suggestion that John McCain ’s ordeal in Vietnam actually proved that torture works . But believe it or not , a Trumpkin may have thrown up an even worse smear than that ....
